cta.headline: Turn more clicks into revenue
cta.sub: Optimize your links, track real conversions and sales, and uncover what drives results. Start using PIMMS to enhance your campaigns and grow your business.

readyToStart.title: Ready to start?
readyToStart.description: Join thousands of marketers using PIMMS to track their campaigns.

newsletter.title: Stay ahead with expert insights
newsletter.description: Get the latest articles on digital marketing, attribution, and growth strategies delivered to your inbox weekly.

utm-parameters.label: UTM Parameters
utm-parameters.title: UTM Parameters - Tracking & Attribution Articles | PIMMS
utm-parameters.description: Discover our comprehensive collection of UTM tracking articles. Learn how to implement UTM parameters, track campaigns, and improve your marketing attribution with expert insights and real-world examples.

stripe.label: Stripe
stripe.title: Stripe Payment Tracking & Analytics Guides | PIMMS
stripe.description: Complete guides for tracking Stripe payments and revenue attribution. Learn how to connect Stripe to PIMMS, implement webhooks, and track every transaction from click to payment.

calcom.label: Cal.com
calcom.title: Cal.com Booking Tracking & Analytics Guides | PIMMS
calcom.description: Learn how to track Cal.com bookings with complete meeting attribution. Step-by-step guides for integrating Cal.com with PIMMS, tracking campaigns, and analyzing which marketing drives appointments.

framer.label: Framer
framer.title: Framer Form Tracking & Analytics Guides | PIMMS
framer.description: Complete guides for tracking forms and conversions on Framer websites. Learn how to set up analytics, track form submissions, and measure campaign performance on your Framer site.

webflow.label: Webflow
webflow.title: Webflow Form Tracking & Lead Attribution Guides | PIMMS
webflow.description: Master Webflow form tracking with complete lead attribution. Step-by-step guides for tracking Webflow forms, analyzing conversions, and connecting leads to marketing campaigns.

calendly.label: Calendly
calendly.title: Calendly Integration
calendly.description: Guides for tracking Calendly bookings and meeting attribution.

zapier.description: Setup guides using Zapier automation for conversion tracking.

systemeio.label: Systeme.io

no-code.label: No-Code
no-code.title: No-Code Tracking Solutions & Analytics Guides | PIMMS
no-code.description: Learn how to track conversions on no-code platforms without coding. Complete guides for Webflow, Framer, Bubble, and AI website builders with simple setup and full attribution.
